course_title: Independent Research: Teaching Grammar Eng. Lang.
class_notes: This grammar course is designed specifically for students who wish to teach or tutor English Language Learners (ELLs).  We will research and analyze the form and meaning of various grammatical structures using the associated metalanguage.  In addition, we will review, critique and practice techniques for teaching those items.
course_description:
Students conduct independent research in support of their own research agenda or
question with guidance from a faculty member. Permission of the department and a
supervising faculty member is required.
sections: Class Nbr: 1213, Section #: 1, Type: RSC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-2:15p, Instructor: J. O'Connor, Status: Open
